about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for the retro-futuristic post-arcade game sphereFACE.

Ambient electronica mingles with deep techno and a sprinkling of chiptune.

A full album length original score, assembled by five independent artists working in collaboration across the globe.

Track list

  • 01 - HODSON - Negative Connotations
  • 02 - Jeremy Dumouchel & Dorian SRed - Diffraction
  • 03 - Skin Walker - Summer of '89
  • 04 - Jeremy Dumouchel & Dorian SRed - Order in the Chaos
  • 05 - Skin Walker - You Know What I Mean
  • 06 - Jeremy Dumouchel - A Sign of Hope
  • 07 - HODSON - Next Town Over
  • 08 - Skin Walker - Moving Boulders
  • 09 - Dorian SRed - Into My Eyes
  • 10 - HODSON - Upon the High Rise
  • 11 - Jeremy Dumouchel & Dorian SRed - Accelerating Universe
  • 12 - HODSON - False Premise
  • 13 - Jeremy Dumouchel - Velocity
  • 14 - mellow sub machine - this edit
